text: Deep Spring Water is a brand of Spring water. It is a division of Coca-Cola Amatil. ==Products== Deep Spring Water sell Spring water in several sizes. These are 400ml, 500ml, 600ml, 1 litre, 1.5 litre sparkling and 2 litre. Deep Spring sells several different flavours, most of which are based on and/or made from fruit. The flavours are: *Orange, Lemon & Lime *Orange & Mango *Orange & Passionfruit *Orange & Berry Twist *Pineapple & Berry Twist *Sparkling Natural Mineral Water ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Bottled water brands Category:Australian companies established in 1981 Category:Food and drink companies established in 1981 Category:Australian drinks
title: Deep Spring (beverage brand)
